metadata.title: CVE-2024-27830

platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 15 SP5

metadata.description: This issue was addressed through improved state management. This issue is fixed in tvOS 17.5, visionOS 1.2, Safari 17.5, iOS 17.5 and iPadOS 17.5, watchOS 10.5, macOS Sonoma 14.5. A maliciously crafted webpage may be able to fingerprint the user.
